column4: Hey guys, if I install the current Ubuntu 12.10 Nightly Release, will I be able to upgrade to a future alpha, beta or Final version?
Hey guys, if I install the current Ubuntu 12.10 Nightly Release, will I be able to upgrade to a future alpha, beta or Final version?
habit, go on the Ubuntu Software Center, click on installed, then uninstall the apps you don't want
